title: Band, mid-16th century
medium:
Medium: linen
Technique: grid of withdrawn element work with reticella style needle lace and embroidery
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Linen band of embroidery bordered by reticella in a geometric pattern of squares and rectangles. Squares are decorated with human figures, animals and mermaids.

tombstone.epitaph:
Band, mid-16th century.
mid-16th century. Medium: linen
Technique: grid of withdrawn element work with reticella style needle lace and embroidery. Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf. 1962-50-127.
